name: 47 Ronin - Arm
description:
A universal robotic Arm with 3 degrees of freedom with an elegant Samurai design.

An interdisciplinary team of scientists and designers created 47 handcrafted robots. The infamous Ronin series... Inspired by ancient Japan, but utilising the newest technological advancements. These robots are not just dangerous, but elegant and beautiful with a long history and many stories to tell.

This NFT is part of the Contaverse gaming universe, learn more here: https://contaquest.com
